noun.description: A piece of embroidery worked in various stitches as a specimen of skill, typically containing the alphabet and some mottoes.
A representative collection or example of something.
examples: a few superb samplers of West Indian dishes

noun.description: A person or device that takes and analyzes samples.
An electronic device for sampling music and sound.

origin: Middle English (denoting an example to be imitated): from Old French essamplaire exemplar.
